short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Bitcoin Cash addresses and Cash Accounts with QR codes for tipping via mobile wallets and Badger Wallet widgets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances plain-text Bitcoin Cash addresses and Cash Accounts with QR codes (tipping via mobile wallets) and integrated Badger Wallet widgets. Automatically finds BCH addresses on the page and adds convenient enhancing options like a QR code and Badger Wallet widget for quick tips, etc.. Optionally converts on address or Cash Account selections (highlighting). You will also be able to tell this extension to ignore certain sites.
